member.summary: Is a Header match case insensitive? (default is true).

member.summary: Is a Query Parameter match case insensitive? (default is true).

member.summary: Is a Request Body match case insensitive? (default is true).

member.summary: Is a ExampleValue match case insensitive? (default is true).

member.summary: Are examples generated dynamically? (default is false).

member.name: F:WireMock.Net.OpenApiParser.Types.ExampleValueType.Value
member.summary: 1. Use a generated example value based on the SchemaType (default). 2. If there is no example value defined in the schema, then the will be used (custom, fixed or dynamic).
